synopsis.text:
Mihai Mihaeroff, a seasoned assassin, Badou Nails, a chain-smoking mercenary with a single eye, Naoto Fuyumine, an orphaned girl skilled with a katana, and Heine Rammsteiner, an albino gunman altered by illicit genetic experiments, navigate a dystopian European metropolis in the anime adaptation of Shirow Miwa's manga series, Dogs. In a society plagued by rampant violence, crime, and unethical scientific experiments, these four individuals cross paths as they delve into their dark pasts.

Mihai, seeking resolution with a former pupil, Badou, stumbling upon forbidden knowledge, Naoto, driven by vengeance for her slain parents, and Heine, striving to rescue another victim of clandestine genetic manipulation, must all confront their personal demons. In a city riddled with corruption, they must find the resilience to overcome their challenges and persevere in this unforgiving world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
